fields.description:
Purpose/reason for this GL account mapping:

• digital_stamp_expense: GL account to post digital stamp/materai costs
• digital_stamp_payment: GL account where stamp payment comes from (cash/bank)
• default_paid_from: Default account for bank transfer source (paid from account)
• default_prepaid: Default prepaid/advance account for deferred expense amortization
• dpp_variance: GL account to post discrepancies between OCR-extracted and manually-entered taxable amount (DPP)
• ppn_variance: GL account to post discrepancies between OCR-extracted and manually-entered tax amount (PPN)

fields.label: GL Account
fields.description: The Chart of Accounts (GL) account to use for this purpose. Must be a valid account code from your company's chart of accounts. This account will be used automatically by various system processes based on the purpose.

fields.label: Company
fields.description: Leave empty for global default (applies to all companies). For multi-company setups, specify a company to use this mapping only for that company. Company-specific mappings take precedence over global defaults.

fields.label: Required
fields.description: If checked, system will throw a validation error if this account cannot be found or is not configured. Uncheck if this mapping is optional.

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Internal notes about this mapping. Use this to document why this account was chosen or any special business rules for this mapping.
